short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI tool is just a click away on any website you're currently visiting. Build your own AI support tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copalot AI Support

Copalot AI Support is designed to enhance your online productivity and build your AI for both internal and user support, especially for small businesses.. 

- Instantly get explanations, summaries, and AI-generated images from any selected text on a webpage.
- Develop a personalized AI chatbot with video FAQs using your content.
- Deploy your AI chatbot on your website and products to provide exceptional user support.

Key Features:

- Comprehensive text explanation, summarization, and image generation.
- Tailored AI chatbot creation to meet your specific needs.
- Rapid deployment of your AI chatbot for customer support online, via email, and on products.

## How to Use:

1. Highlight text on any webpage.
2. Right-click or click the Copalot extension icon.
3. Select options to explain, summarize, explore additional AI tools, add to your chatbot, or create FAQs.
4. Get help from your AI or use it for custom support.

Privacy-Focused:

- Your sensitive data is encrypted and securely stored.
- We do not sell or share your personal information.

Permissions:

- Access and modify data on websites you visit (necessary for text selection, and add content to your AI).

Copalot AI Support helps you create and utilize AI tools effectively, boosting your productivity  and enhancing user support in your business. 

Try it now!
